paper_abstract: The Sugeno integral has been identified and used as all aggregation operator many times in the past. In this paper, an extension of the Sugeno integral for the framework of possibilistic truth values is presented. resulted in a powerful domain-specific aggregation operator. Next. it is shown how the presented integral call be plugged into a reasoning framework for identification of coreferent objects. which are entity descriptions that refer to the same entity in a different way. The concept of hierarchical fuzzy measures, linked to in object structure is introduced, offering a new conditional possibilistic reasoning framework for object matching. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals. Inc.
paper_title: Extensions of Fuzzy Measures and Sugeno Integral for Possibilistic Truth Values
